title: Integrated Competency Development Program Through School Library Self-Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learner role: School library manager or educational planner. Learning objective: Establishing library operation strategies and integrating them into school development plans using self-assessment processes

learning_goals: Students can diagnose and analyze operational status using a school library self-assessment tool.
Students can develop linkage strategies with school development plans based on assessment results.
Students can improve integrated library operation models through peer case-sharing.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
